channel.title: 12 errors compiling
channel.description:
[code]src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:3222: error: method resetVariables () is already defined in class PlayerAssistant public void resetVariables() { ^ src\server\model\players\skills\Prayer.java:49: error: cannot find symbol if(amount >= 1 && c.usingAltar && c.getItems().playerHas Item(id,1)) { ^ symbol: variable usingAltar location: variable c of type Client src\server\model\players\skills\Prayer.java:69: error: cannot find symbol if (boneAmount > 0&&c.usingAltar && c.ge tItems().playerHasItem(id,1)) { ^ symbol: variable usingAltar location: variable c of type Client src\server\model\players\skills\Prayer.java:89: error: cannot find symbol c.usingAltar=false; ^ symbol: variable usingAltar location: variable c of type Client src\server\model\items\UseItem.java:36: error: cannot find symbol if (c.getPrayer().isBone(itemId) && c.usingAltar ==false) { ^ symbol: variable usingAltar location: variable c of type Client src\server\model\items\UseItem.java:37: error: cannot find symbol c.usingAltar=true; ^ symbol: variable usingAltar location: variable c of type Client src\server\model\items\UseItem.java:38: error: cannot find symbol c.altarItemId=itemId; ^ symbol: variable altarItemId location: variable c of type Client src\server\model\players\packets\BankX2.java:103: error: cannot find symbol if(c.usingAltar==true) ^ symbol: variable usingAltar location: variable c of type Client src\server\model\players\packets\BankX2.java:104: error: cannot find symbol c.getPrayer().bonesOnAltar2(c.altarItemId, Xamount); ^ symbol: variable altarItemId location: variable c of type Client src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:858: error: cannot find symbol Player player = PlayerHandler.getPlayer(playerCo mmand ^ symbol: method getPlayer(String) location: class PlayerHandler src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:876: error: cannot find symbol Player player = PlayerHandler.getPlayer(playerCo mmand ^ symbol: method getPlayer(String) location: class PlayerHandler src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:894: error: cannot find symbol Player player = PlayerHandler.getPlayer(playerCo mmand ^ symbol: method getPlayer(String) location: class PlayerHandler Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 12 errors Compile Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I need to get this working asap because i can't update my server before this is fixed..

item.title: 12 errors compiling
item.dc:creator: @Cuber317 Cuber317
item.description:
@Cuber317 wrote:

[quote=“DAn0194, post:4, topic:541669”][quote author=Cuber317 link=topic=660538.msg4416473#msg4416473 date=1396136387]
Got it fixed myself and didn’t even need to use my brains…that much…
[/quote]
Next time before making 3 different topics actually try doing the problem yourself.(sometimes you’ll be able to fix it like now)[/quote]

Actually, I had to delete what i had added unsuccessfully because i did not manage to fix it.

Read full topic
